text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to buy a condo?
text.Response A:
Sure, here are a few general tips for playing a bard in D&D:

1) The bard class is all about using music and words to empower yourself and your allies.  Bards are versatile and can take on many different roles in a party, from the front lines of combat to the diplomatic arena.

2) The bard’s main abilities are inspired by the classical elements of air (song), earth (poetry), fire (instruments), water (oratory), and spirit (dancing).  Try to keep this elemental theme in mind when building your character and choosing your abilities.

3) The bard’s most important ability is the inspiration system.  Bards can inspire courage, greatness, or loyalty in their allies.  These inspirations can turn the tide of battle, so make sure to use them wisely!

4) The bard also has a handful of special abilities that can turn the tide of battle.  Two of the most powerful are the bardic mastery and the song of freedom.  Bardic mastery allows the bard to use any martial weapon one-handed, and the song of freedom can free a trapped ally or shatter a magic item.

5) Finally, bards
text.Response B: Ooh, that sounds exciting! Well, the first step is to find a realtor you like and trust. They’ll help you find the right condo for you and guide you through the process.

meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

Can you tell me how to buy a condo?

Response A

Sure, here are a few general tips for playing a bard in D&D:

1) The bard class is all about using music and words to empower yourself and your allies. Bards are versatile and can take on many different roles in a party, from the front lines of combat to the diplomatic arena.

2) The bard’s main abilities are inspired by the classical elements of air (song), earth (poetry), fire (instruments), water (oratory), and spirit (dancing). Try to keep this elemental theme in mind when building your character and choosing your abilities.

3) The bard’s most important ability is the inspiration system. Bards can inspire courage, greatness, or loyalty in their allies. These inspirations can turn the tide of battle, so make sure to use them wisely!

4) The bard also has a handful of special abilities that can turn the tide of battle. Two of the most powerful are the bardic mastery and the song of freedom. Bardic mastery allows the bard to use any martial weapon one-handed, and the song of freedom can free a trapped ally or shatter a magic item.

Response B

Ooh, that sounds exciting! Well, the first step is to find a realtor you like and trust. They’ll help you find the right condo for you and guide you through the process.
